title: Dirt Track Racing for PC
material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM, CD envelope, install instructions in cardboard box
brief_description: In Dirt Track Racing, the player controls a vehicle in a race around oval or figure-eight dirt tracks. The game features three classes of cars - stock, pro stock, and late model - which can be enhanced with high performance parts. The game allows you to either play one race or go through a career mode where the player starts with next to nothing and slowly accumulates more money and better cars through winning races and gaining sponsors. The player can also race up to 10 people online.
